[Works] Submitted a new manuscript

January 16, 2021

Submitted a new manuscript to JGR-Solid Earth.

I submitted a first-authored manuscript to Journal of Geophysical Research - Solid Earth. The co-authors are Drs. Hiroo Kanamori, Luis Rivera, Zhongwen Zhan, Shingo Watada, Tung-Cheng Ho, and Kenji Satake. You can check the detailed information in “Works”.

The submitted manuscript is available in a pre-print service Earth and Space Science Open Archive (ESSOAr). Please note that the manuscript is not peer-reviewed.
